DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate diagnostic accuracy MR arthrography wrist 1.5 , 3.0 , 7.0T wrist arthroscopy reference standard .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Accuracy Direct MR Arthrography Of The Wrist At 1.5 , 3.0 And 7.0T
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : age > 18 ; clinical evidence wrist joint abnormality ; request MR arthrography prior wrist arthroscopy ; willingness take part study write informed consent ; Exclusion criterion : age < 18 ; history prior wrist surgery ; systemic disease e.g . rheumatoid arthritis ; infection ; history adverse contrast reaction ; contraindication MR imaging ( e.g . pacemaker , metallic implant , etc . ) ; history possible sign renal failure ( see section `` nephrogenic systemic fibrosis '' )
